segments.text: I've heard that you've made a new strange friend recently , Sophie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . He is an old man with a great sense of humour . Not only can he play the piano , he also draws pictures very well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you can learn a lot from him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , he has no children , so he sometimes feel s very lonely . I often go to his house to play and talk with him . That makes him feel very happy .
segments.speaker: S2
